references: Related: Ord 43548, Ord 43547, Ord 44097, Ord 44675, Ord 44893
summary: An ordinance relating to the right of way heretofore acquired in King, Snohomish and Skagit Counties for the Skagit Transmission system, providing for the acquisition by condemnation or purchase of the right to construct towers of any design, material or spacing, at suitable locations thereon, and providing for the ascertainment and payment of just compensation to be made therefor.
